topic.title: Getting Started
topic.shortdesc: Getting started for the first time user of Couchbase Server and related SDKs.

body.p: You can easily install Couchbase Server on Linux, Microsoft Windows, or OS X systems. These streamlined instructions will help you get up and running as quickly as possible in a non-production, development environment. We will follow through each of these steps to build up your experience with Couchbase Server.
